India-Sri Lanka Free Trade Agreement (ISLFTA)

implemented in 2006 (d)
Global System of Trade Preferences (GSTP)

Implemented in 1989

Implemented in 2005

Total Exports under Preferential Agreements
As a share of Sri Lanka's Total Merchandise 
Exports
(a) Provisional
(b) The EU-GSP provides preferential access for 66 
per cent of the tariff lines on imported goods to 
the EU, while the EU-GSP+ provides zero duty 
access to the same tariff lines on imported goods 
to the EU.
(c) Includes Russia, Belarus and Kazakhstan
(d) Earlier known as the Bangkok Agreement (1975)
